channel.title: Clicking buttons
channel.description:
Hey guys, i'm having a problem with clicking buttons. I also provided a video with what i need help with. So basically i want each case to go to a different function. I just need help with how the teleaction works and such. Please help. Thanks.
video: http://youtu.be/ujxpDvna-24

item.title: Clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

                case 9167:
                case 4140:
                case 50235:
                case 117112:
                        if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastTeleport > 5000) {

                        //c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.LUMBY_X, Config.LUMBY_Y, 0, "modern");

                        c.getDH().sendOption5("Islands", "Desert", "Snow Mountain", "Slayer Tower", "Dungeons");

                        c.teleAction = 1;

                         }
                        break;

Change that…
to:

                case 9167:
                     //Now this case is separate, and you can do WHATEVER YOU WANT here!
                     break;
                case 4140:
                case 50235:
                case 117112:
                        if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastTeleport > 5000) {

                        //c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.LUMBY_X, Config.LUMBY_Y, 0, "modern");

                        c.getDH().sendOption5("Islands", "Desert", "Snow Mountain", "Slayer Tower", "Dungeons");

                        c.teleAction = 1;

                         }
                        break;

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

video was not very informative but from what i see you need something with the current dialog.
Somehow the dialog handler knows what screen you are looking at, but you do not tell it to update the next screen state. IDK how it works particularly but if someone knows what i am talking about, they may be able to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

Mid-edge is one of the buttons. But if i put down case 9167 i will obviously get a duplicate error. So i need to know how to make mid-edge teleport me to my desired location.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

see that:

                case 9167:
                case 4140:
                case 50235:
                case 117112:
                        if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastTeleport > 5000) {

                        //c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.LUMBY_X, Config.LUMBY_Y, 0, "modern");

                        c.getDH().sendOption5("Islands", "Desert", "Snow Mountain", "Slayer Tower", "Dungeons");

                        c.teleAction = 1;

                         }
                        break;

all this cases(buttons) will do that code(opening the options).
so mid edge pk is probably one of the buttons.

Read full topic
